alert.note: Alert for Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 4:12PM CDT until June 08 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Liberty County in southeastern Texas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 411 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Plum Grove, or 10 miles southeast of Cleveland, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Northern Liberty, Dayton, Hardin, Kenefick, Dayton Lakes and Tarkington Prairie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
